T = int(raw_input())
while(T>0):
    T=T-1
    N = int(raw_input())
    arrive = map(int, raw_input().split())
    dep = map(int, raw_input().split())
    arrive.sort()
    dep.sort()
    j=0
    count = 0
    maxcount = -1
    for i in range(0,N):
        count = count + 1
        if(dep[j]<=arrive[i]):
            count = count - 1
            j = j + 1

        if(count>maxcount):
            maxcount = count

    print maxcount
